quiz.text:
What is the total compound interest earned at the end of three years?

Only II
Only I or only III
only III

quiz.text:
Rinku borrowed an amount of Rs 5000 from Milan and Rahul. What is the rate of interest?

Statement I: Rinku returned the amount of Rs 5400 after due date to Milan.

Statement II: Rinku returned Rs 5900 to Rahul after due date.

Statement III: Rinku returned the money to Milan by SI, whereas to Rahul by compound interest.
options: Only A and B together are sufficient
Only B and C together are sufficient
A, B and C together are necessary
Either A and B together or B and C together are sufficient.
A, B and C even together are not sufficient.

quiz.text:
The compound interest earned on a certain amount is Rs 432.10. What is the rate of interest?

A. The interest was for a period of 4 years.

B. The simple interest for the same period with the same rate would have been Rs 400.

options: Only A and C together
Only A, B and C together
Only A and B together
All the three together are not sufficient
None of these

quiz.text:

options: I only
III only
I or II only
All I, II and III are required
I and III
